unit: Unit 9 | Inference for Quantitative Data: Slopes
title: Self-Esteem | 1 of 2
question_text: A high school principal is curious if a linear relationship exists between student height and score on a self-esteem test. A random sample of $20$ pairs of students was taken. A linear regression $T$ -test was performed on $H_0: B = 0$ vs. $H_a: B > 0$ , and the test statistic of $t = 3.19$ was calculated. What is the approximate $p$ -value?
